All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    AcceptFriendRequest
    Accepts a friend request and updates the list adapter to display the change.
    ActiveUserProfile
    ActiveUserProfile displays the logged in user's information and allows them to change their username and password.
    AdminHomePage
    AdminHomePage creates a list of controls an admin can use and redirect to inorder to use.
    AdminUserProfilePage
    AdminUserProfilePage displays a user's profile with extra information that an admin has access to read.
    AppController
    App controller holds a request queue that sends out volley requests to the server.
    BoardModel
    Models a game board for Chinese Checkers Allows a simulation of the game by defining the boundry of the board, and making valid moves
    Const
    Const holds all HTTP request URLS that are used.
    Coordinate
    A x and y coordinate to represnt a location in 3D space
    CreateFriendRequest
    creates a friend request and refreshes the current activity if the activity passed is not null and refreshActivity is true.
    CreatePrivateLobbyReq
    create private lobby requests asks the server to make a private lobby and then puts the user into a lobby activity.
    DeleteFriendRequest
    Deletes a friend request and updates the adapter display the friend request list.
    DeleteFriendship
    Deletes an accepted friendship and refreshes the current activity if the activity passed is not null and refreshActivity is true.
    FriendListPage
    FriendListPage displays all friends a user has in a list.
    FriendRequestCustomAdapter
    FriendRequestCustomAdapter displays friend requests as a list and determines the layout that each row is implemented by based on the friend request type.
    FriendRequestEnum
    The type of a friend request.
    FriendRequestListPage
    FriendRequestListPage displays either incoming or outgoing friend requests depending on which button the user has clicked.
    FriendRequestModel
    Models friend requests and the data it contains.
    GameBoardFrag
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    GamePage
    GamePage displays a the game the user currently occupies, and communicates with the server to make and receive moves with other players.
    GetFriendRequests
    Gets all friendships that are in the given request type of incoming or outgoing and then displays them in a list using the custom friend request adapter.
    GetFriends
    Gets all friendships that have been accepted for the sent user and displays them in a list.
    GetFriendships
    Get friendships requires the chosen user id to be in the request URL.
    GetUserProfileRequest
    Gets a user by the user ID using an HTTP request and then updates the necessary views in the current activity.
    HomePage
    HomePage is the main activity for Chinese Checkers.
    ISimpleRequest
    Interface for a volley request.
    JoinPrivateLobbyReq
    Join private lobby request asks for a private lobby object and then puts the user into the lobby.
    LeaveLobbyReq
    Leave lobby request send a post request to the server to remove the parameter user from the lobby object.
    LobbyPage
    LobbyPage is the user 'hub' where users are grouped before a game begins.
    LoginPage
    The Login Page is the first page a user sees, where they are requested to provide their login credentials.
    LruBitmapCache
    LruBitmapCache helps with the transferring of images over HTTP
    PasswordUpdateRequest
    This class overrides the user update volley request for changing passwords.
    PegMove
    Represents a given arbitrary move, moving a peg from one space to another
    PrivateLobbyPage
    private lobby page holds the user's in a lobby, displays the lobby ID, and the join code of the lobby.
    SignUp
    The Sign Up Page is the page a user sees when they want to make a new account, where they are requested to provide login credentials for the new account.
    SingleMoveDirection
    enumerator for the 6 directions a given piece may move on a chinese checkers board
    StatsModel
    Models the user's stats including matches played, amount of opponents met, and win count.
    StringVolleyRequest
    Generic volley request that sends a null object to the given URL using the HTTP request type expecting a string as a response.
    UpdateStatsRequest
    Gets all stats for the user with the given user id in the URL when sending a get request.
    UpdateUser
    Update User implements the create request object that holds the target user and sending user.
    UserList
    UserList displays all users in a scrollable list where it displays the user's username and clicking on a row send you to their profile page.
    UserModel
    Models a user with their general data and their secret.
    UsernameUpdateRequest
    This class overrides the user update volley request for changing usernames.
    UserProfile
    UserProfile displays a user's general public information and their stats.
    UserStatsRequest
    Gets all stats for the user with the given user id in the URL when sending a get request.
    VolleyArrayRequest
    Generic volley request that sends a null object to the given URL using the HTTP request type expecting a JSON array as a response.
    VolleyProgressDialog
    VolleyProgressDialog displays a loading screen dialog when making a HTTP request.
    VolleyRequest
    Generic volley request that sends a null object to the given URL using the HTTP request type expecting a JSON object as a response.
